text: ai eemaanadaaron aapanee khairaat ko ehasaan jataane aur (saayal ko) eeza (takaleeph) dene kee vajah se us shakhs kee tarah akaarat mat karo jo apana maal mahaz logon ko dikhaane ke vaaste kharch karata hai aur khuda aur roje aakherat par eemaan nahin rakhata to usakee khairaat kee misaal us chikanee chattaan kee see hai jisapar kuchh khaak (padee huee) ho phir usapar zor shor ka (bade bade qataron se) menh barase aur usako (mittee ko bahaake) chikana chupada chhod jae (isee tarah) riyaakaar apanee us khairaat ya usake savaab mein se jo unhonne kee hai kisee cheez par qabza na paenge (na duniya mein na aakherat mein) aur khuda kaafiron ko hidaayat karake manzile maqasood tak nahin pahunchaaya karata
